title: ECS Component Meta-Schema
description: Schema for defining ECS Components - resources/capabilities that can be composed into Nodes

description.description: Human-readable description of the component's purpose

depends_on.description: List of component names this component depends on (must be initialized first)

env_var.description: Environment variable to read this config from

config.description: Configuration options for initializing the component

rust_type.description: The Rust type this component resolves to (e.g., Arc<DatabasePool>)

requires_llm.description: Whether this component requires LLM connectivity

singleton.description: Whether only one instance of this component can exist per Node
